Example.Name: power_reset
Example.Description: The Reset Control Unit (RSTCU) has three kinds of reset including power on reset, system reset, and APB unit reset. Power on reset (Cold reset) resets full system during power up. System reset resets the processor core and peripheral IP components but the SW-DP controller are excluded. The resets can be triggered by an external signal (off chip), internal events, and reset generators.
